body:
## Error:

in all available containers w/spack preinstalled (`spack/ubuntu-xenial, ''/ubuntu-bionic, ''/centos6, ''/centos7`):
`==> Warning: gcc@4.4.7 cannot build optimized binaries for "skylake". Using best target possible: "core2"`

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install orthofiller
```
fails either: at the [beginning in both centOS's](https://pastebin.com/gcKKDnnS) and at `blastplus/augustus` in ubuntus'. Tried circumnavigating through `apt install`ing other packages, but because the versions of the Spack installed packages are wrong, it does not work.

### Information on your system

Docker, containers specified above
```
* **Spack:** 0.15.4
* **Python:** 2.6.6
* **Platform:** linux-centos6-skylake
```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers | 
-- Xonq: **(no maintainers in stdout)**, using original github publishers
--- @codeandkey
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
-- Will need to modify the dockerfile for this
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: Orthofiller 1.1.4 (Docker)
